collection.name: Blubbering Toad
collection.openText: "How can I make it stop crying?"

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0's Qliphoth counter decreased when the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter also has a small chance to decrease upon getting a normal work result.
$0 dislikes instinct and repression works. After finishing a work on $0, the employee will get its gift. When the work result was good, $0 restored the SP of everyone in the facility.
When $0's Qliphoth counter reaches 0, it will begin to cry inside its containment unit and no work can be done until $0 is suppressed.
$0 is extremely resistant to all damages except PALE.
